pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.utils

Interface StatisticsUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsUtilsImpl

    public interface StatisticsUtils
    Interface used to perform operations on access codes and project statistics
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

      • createCodeUsageHistoryResult

        CodeUsageHistoryResult createCodeUsageHistoryResult(String accessCodeValue,
                                                    long sumOfUsage,
                                                    String accessCodeOwener)
        Returns a CodeUsageHistoryResult with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        accessCodeValue - The String containing the value of the access code
        sumOfUsage - The long containing the number of code usage
        accessCodeOwener - The String containing the owner of the access code
        Returns:
        A CodeUsageHistoryResult representing the CodeUsageHistoryResult with given parameters
